attributes.action: Give back control and power to the Police, and reduce the amount of red tape Police officers have to complete to allow them to do their job more efficiently
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The title is self explanatory about it's aim, however the result would be a Police Force to be reckoned with, by re-gaining respect and becoming a role model on an international scale. The public would feel protected once again, and crime would reduce. Let's get this done! FAST. -I give you one month people.
